note.p: Career: Fellow and Tutor of St John's College, Oxford; late Lt-Colonel, RAMC, and Physiological Adviser, Directorate of Gas Services, GHQ, France
AssocMaterial: NCUACS 1/87. Papers deposited in the Library for the History of Neuroscience, Oxford
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1964 vol 10 pp 51-74, plate, by D J C Cunningham
